data.title: Webpack
data.description: A powerful JavaScript bundler that compiles modern JavaScript applications into optimized, smaller bundles for browsers.

data.title: Gulp
data.description: A toolkit for automating tasks in development, such as minifying files, compiling Sass, and optimizing images.

data.title: Grunt
data.description: A JavaScript task runner that helps automate repetitive tasks such as linting, compiling, and testing code.

data.title: Parcel
data.description: A fast, zero-configuration web application bundler that automatically handles various file types and dependencies.

data.title: Rollup
data.description: A module bundler for JavaScript, focusing on producing smaller, more efficient code by eliminating unused exports.

data.title: Vite
data.description: A modern build tool optimized for speed and development experience, offering fast server start and on-demand JavaScript compilation.

data.title: Make
data.description: A build automation tool that uses Makefiles to define and manage dependencies and rules for compiling and linking software projects.

data.title: Maven
data.description: A build and project management tool for Java-based applications, focused on dependency management and project configuration.

data.title: Gradle
data.description: A versatile build tool that automates the building, testing, and deployment of software, commonly used for Java projects.

data.title: Bazel
data.description: A build tool that supports large-scale, multi-language projects, providing fast, reproducible builds and tests.

data.title: Ninja
data.description: A small, fast build system that generates builds more efficiently by using simple files and commands to track dependencies.

data.title: Ant
data.description: A Java-based build tool that uses XML to define the steps and tasks needed for building, testing, and packaging applications.

data.title: CMake
data.description: A cross-platform build system that generates native build environments like Makefiles or project files for compilers and IDEs.

data.title: SBT
data.description: A build tool for Scala and Java projects that offers interactive workflows and integrates with modern developer environments.

data.title: Buck
data.description: A fast build tool that uses a deterministic approach to build software projects with an emphasis on speed and parallelization.
